title: Intrusion
description: After a deadly home invasion at a couple’s new dream house, the traumatized wife searches for answers — and learns the real danger is just beginning.

title: Paranoia
description: Blackmailed by his company's CEO, a low-level employee finds himself forced to spy on the boss's rival and former mentor.

title: Prey
description: A hiking trip into the wild turns into a desperate bid for survival for five friends on the run from a mysterious shooter.

title: Paradise Hills
description: Uma wakes up in a lush tropical facility designed to turn willful girls into perfect ladies. That’s bad enough, but its real purpose is even worse.

title: In the Cut
description: After embarking on an affair with the cop probing the murder of a young woman, an insular schoolteacher suspects her lover was involved in the crime.

title: In Too Deep
description: Rookie cop Jeffrey Cole poses as a drug dealer to take down a crime lord and soon gets caught up in an underworld of bribery, intimidation and murder.

title: Level 16
description: In a bleak academy that teaches girls the virtues of passivity, two students uncover the ghastly purpose behind their training and resolve to escape.

title: Black Island
description: The dark secrets of a seemingly peaceful island threaten to swallow up an orphaned student when he grows close to a mysterious new teacher.

title: The Net
description: A computer analyst becomes a target after she stumbles onto a conspiracy via a mysterious floppy disk, forcing her to go on the run to clear her name.

title: Hostage House
description: A realtor and her daughter get taken captive by two fugitive criminals during an open house, forcing her to find creative ways to ensure their survival.

title: Lethal Love
description: After a business owner starts receiving online threats, doubts and paranoia creep in when she reconnects with a former flame and meets a new client.

title: The Game
description: An aloof investment banker's life spirals into peril and paranoia after his brother gives him an odd birthday gift: the chance to play a mysterious game.

title: Lying and Stealing
description: A talented thief teams up with an aspiring actress to steal art from LA's high rollers. For their last heist, they're going for the ultimate: freedom.

title: Until Midnight
description: After returning home from a work trip, a newlywed must fight off a masked intruder before his wife returns at midnight.

title: Domestic Disturbance
description: A recovering alcoholic is skeptical of his son's claim that his new stepfather is a killer – but soon begins to sense the boy is telling the truth.

title: The Interpreter
description: Silvia Broome is a translator at the United Nations. But her job turns perilous when she overhears a plot to assassinate a government official.

title: Welcome Home
description: A couple rents a villa in Italy hoping to mend their bruised relationship, but the devilishly charming homeowner can’t seem to leave them alone.

title: Small Town Crime
description: When a disgraced ex-cop discovers a dying woman, he's compelled to track down her killer — an act of self-redemption that takes him down a dark path.

title: Layer Cake
description: A suave, steely-eyed London cocaine dealer's retirement plans hit a violent snag when his boss asks him to do one more job.

title: Deadly Switch
description: In this indie thriller, a foreign exchange student moves in with her roommate's family who grieves over the daughter they would do anything to get back.

title: Between Worlds
description: Grieving for his dead wife and daughter, a trucker plunges into a romance with a mother who needs his help. The dead, however, are far from gone.

title: Miss Sloane
description: A tenacious Capitol Hill lobbyist with a well-earned reputation for winning takes on the most challenging battle of her career.

title: Synchronic
description: Two paramedics begin to question their realities after coming across several bizarre deaths linked to a new narcotic with mind-bending effects.

title: Only Mine
description: After dating a charming cop who turns into an obsessive stalker, a small-town girl must save herself from his deadly ways.

title: Irul
description: When a car breakdown forces a couple to seek shelter in a nearby home, conversations with the stranger inside soon suggest there’s a killer among them.

title: Deadly Illusions
description: After a bestselling novelist suffering from writer's block hires a new nanny for her children, the line between fiction and reality starts to blur.

title: The Girl on the Train
description: A troubled divorcée fixates on a seemingly ideal couple from afar until a shocking observation sends her spiraling straight into a knotty murder case.

title: Who Am I
description: After his compatriots are murdered by Russian gangsters, a hacker confesses the history of his elite, fame-seeking group to a Europol investigator.

title: Blue, Painful, Fragile
description: Kaede and Hisano form a club to change the world. When Hisano vanishes, Kaede throws himself into bringing the club back to its idealistic roots.

title: My Teacher, My Obsession
description: When Riley changed schools, she didn't expect the girls to crush on her English teacher dad. And he didn't expect a disturbing infatuation.

title: Red Dot
description: Trying to rekindle their marriage and with a child on the way, a young couple on a ski trip suddenly finds themselves stalked by remorseless killers.

title: Shutter Island
description: A U.S. marshal's troubling visions compromise his investigation into the disappearance of a patient from a hospital for the criminally insane.

title: Sightless
description: A former violinist grows suspicious of the new people in her life and their alarming behavior as she recovers from an assault that left her blind.

title: The Vanished
description: When their daughter disappears during a family vacation, two terrified parents launch their own investigation that soon exposes local secrets.

title: Al acecho
description: Looking for a fresh start, a park ranger gets a new assignment. When he discovers a network of poachers, survival depends on his lethal instincts.

title: Angels & Demons
description: A Harvard symbologist races to uncover clues that will help stop an attack on the Vatican by a secret society looking to retaliate for old persecutions.

title: The Da Vinci Code
description: When the curator of the Louvre is killed, a Harvard professor and a cryptographer must untangle a web of deceit involving works of Leonardo da Vinci.

title: Rust Creek
description: A wrong turn in the woods becomes a fight for her life when a career-seeking college student runs into two outlaw brothers looking to cook up trouble.

title: The Call
description: Connected by phone in the same home but 20 years apart, a serial killer puts another woman’s past — and life — on the line to change her own fate.

title: 40 Sticks
description: When their prison bus crashes in a forest on a rainy night, a group of criminals finds themselves battling wild animals and a mysterious killer.

title: Raman Raghav 2.0
description: A corrupt cop and a serial killer obsessed with a psychopath from the '60s get caught up in a ruthless cat-and-mouse game in this Indian thriller.

title: Killer Cove
description: An unlucky woman finds a solution for her hateful ex, a trying job hunt and a stalker through a charming P.I. – only to endure a new set of problems.

title: Prospect
description: A father and daughter travel to an alien moon in search of a valuable gem but are forced to alter their plans when a nefarious outlaw gets involved.

title: Anaamika
description: As a woman scours Hyderabad for her missing husband, she becomes entangled in a conspiracy that suggests there’s more to the mystery than meets the eye.

title: Nee Enge En Anbe
description: As a woman scours Hyderabad for her missing husband, she becomes entangled in a conspiracy that suggests there’s more to the mystery than meets the eye.

title: Unknown Origins
description: A very chiseled but somber detective must find a serial killer who leaves clues that only his mentor's nerdy comics-loving son can decipher.

title: Sin City
description: A busy couple tries to give their love life a boost by taking an impromptu weekend trip only to find their relationship tested in unexpected ways.

title: What Keeps You Alive
description: A couple's romantic anniversary retreat to a rural cabin unravels when a childhood friend appears and reveals long-held secrets from the past.

title: Offering to the Storm
description: Amaia investigates several suspicious infant deaths and horrific rituals. Meanwhile, people around her risk grave danger. Part 3 in the Baztan Trilogy.

title: Fatal Affair
description: A lawyer is caught in a terrifying game of cat and mouse when a drink with an old friend escalates into an obsession that jeopardizes everyone she loves.

title: Double Jeopardy
description: After being framed and serving time for her husband's supposed murder, Libby decides to kill her "late" husband for good.

title: Forensic
description: A pair of officers with history navigates clues from the past, false leads and a ticking clock to nab an elusive serial killer who targets young girls.

title: The Delivery Boy
description: A teen criminal and a young sex worker forge an unlikely alliance during a night that forces them to confront painful pasts and crises of conscience.

title: Get In
description: When he returns from vacation and finds his home occupied by squatters, a family man is caught in a conflict that escalates to terrifying heights.

title: Mrs. Serial Killer
description: When a doctor gets jailed for a string of shocking murders, his loyal wife sets out to commit a copycat crime to prove his innocence.

title: Dangerous Lies
description: A broke caregiver unexpectedly inherits her patient's estate, but dark secrets swirl around her newfound wealth, tangling her in deceit and danger.

title: Kolaiyuthir Kaalam
description: The speech-and-hearing-impaired heiress of a palatial mansion must rely on basic instincts when a masked invader is determined to kill her.

description: Wanting to leave their dystopian world behind for a faraway paradise, three outlaws plot a money heist — and draw the attention of a vicious killer.

title: The Plagues of Breslau
description: After a body is found sewn inside a cow hide, a Wrocław detective discovers a killer is recreating an 18th-century "plague" of criminal punishments.

title: The Silence of the Marsh
description: While researching corruption for his new book, a successful crime novelist shades the line between fiction and reality.

title: The Legacy of the Bones
description: A year after solving a series of murders, detective Amaia is faced with a related mystery in the Baztán Valley that ends up hitting very close to home.

title: Pretty Little Stalker
description: When a self-help writer's advice goes wrong, she finds herself in the crosshairs of an obsessive young woman with a thirst for vengeance.

title: The Occupant
description: An unemployed advertising executive begins stalking the new tenants of his former home and his motives toward the family turn sinister.

title: Bypass Road
description: On the night his ex-lover mysteriously dies, a top fashion designer has a serious accident, raising questions on whether the incidents are linked.

title: Twin Murders: the Silence of the White City
description: A detective returns to Vitoria-Gasteiz to solve murders mimicking those allegedly committed by a serial killer who's about to be released from prison.

title: The Body
description: Mind games and mystery abound as a detective investigates the disappearance of a woman’s body from a morgue in this Hindi remake of a Spanish thriller.

title: Thambi
description: As a tip leads a local politician to his long-estranged son, his daughter has doubts about whether the young man is truly family or just an impostor.

title: Die Ontwaking
description: An inexperienced murder detective joins a desperate search for a deranged serial killer who possesses a deep obsession with young women’s skin.

title: Jacob's Ladder
description: After being reunited with a brother he thought was killed in combat, a former army medic begins to experience violent, paranoid visions.

title: Game
description: A tycoon accuses three strangers of killing his daughter but mysteriously dies before he can expose them, sparking a tangled hunt for the real culprit.

title: The 9th Precinct
description: An idealistic cop joins an underground police unit and battles ghoulish forces threatening the balance between the human and the supernatural realms.

title: Zero Hour
description: After his father passes, the heir to a retail empire returns to take over the family business but faces a controversy involving laundering and murder.

title: U Turn
description: A reporter must hunt for the truth behind a strange murder after she crosses paths with a young cop and becomes the investigation's prime suspect.

title: Fractured
description: After his wife and injured daughter disappear from an ER, a man conducts a panicked search and becomes convinced the hospital is hiding something.

title: Unbridled
description: Desperate to keep her husband’s secret, a devoted politician’s wife struggles to stave off threats that could ruin their promising new life.

title: Selfless
description: A dying tycoon has his consciousness transplanted into the body of a healthy young man, only to make a troubling discovery about the body's origin.

title: Badla
description: When a woman is accused of killing her lover, a renowned lawyer is hired – but the more they try to  untangle the truth, the more convoluted it becomes.

title: Secret Obsession
description: When Jennifer wakes up with amnesia after a traumatic attack, her doting husband cares for her. But she soon realizes the danger is far from over.

title: Kahaani
description: Pregnant and alone in the city of Kolkata, a woman begins a relentless search for her missing husband, only to find that nothing is what it seems.

title: Cop Car
description: Two mischievous boys get thrust into a game of cat and mouse with a murderous psychopath after they decide to steal a police officer’s cruiser.

title: Svaha: The Sixth Finger
description: A minister who researches religious cults turns to his Buddhist monk friend for help investigating a new group with mysterious origins.

title: Ek Khiladi Ek Haseena
description: Indebted to a gangster, a grifter assembles a band of fellow swindlers to attempt his biggest scam yet, but it's soon clear that no one can be trusted.

title: Echcharikkai
description: After kidnapping a millionaire’s daughter, two men get swept up in a power struggle as her father enlists a brilliant cop to hunt them down.

title: Puriyatha Puthir
description: An aspiring music director begins to receive voyeuristic footage of his girlfriend from her apparent stalker as tragedy strikes those around him.

title: Lang Tong
description: After seducing a philandering con man, a rebellious young woman enlists his help in carrying out a heinous crime against her sister.

title: Accident
description: A contract killer skilled at staging lethal accidents fears he may be a victim of his own strategy when an accomplice dies in a mysterious mishap.

title: Aamir
description: In this high-tension thriller, an anonymous caller on a cell phone threatens to harm a man's family if he doesn't carry out every order.

title: Edge of Fear
description: During a wilderness getaway, a gang of sociopathic criminals kidnap a woman and assault her husband, who must summon all his strength to save her.

title: Grandmaster
description: Anticipating the next move in a serial killer's grisly game, a police chief realizes that his daughter and estranged wife are the next likely victims.

title: Kurbaan
description: When a young Indian couple moves to the American suburbs, they are shocked to discover that they've become enmeshed in a secret terrorist plot.

title: In Darkness
description: A blind pianist fears for her life after the suspicious death of her neighbor, the daughter of a businessman accused of war crimes.

title: The Warning
description: After his friend is shot, Jon finds a mathematical pattern behind deaths that occurred at the same location and sets out to warn the next young victim.

title: TAU
description: Kidnapped by an inventor who uses her as a test subject to perfect his robotic AI, a street-smart young woman tries to escape her high-tech prison.

title: Bullet Head
description: After a daring heist, three fugitives lock themselves in a warehouse hoping to evade the police, but find a worse threat as they fight to stay alive.

title: Mute
description: When his girlfriend vanishes, a mute man ventures into a near-future Berlin's seamy underworld, where his actions speak louder than words.

title: Bad Day for the Cut
description: A mild-mannered, middle-aged Irish farmer devoted to his mother embarks on a violent quest for revenge when she's murdered in a home invasion.

title: Getaway Plan
description: Professional burglar and blowtorch expert Víctor is recruited by the Russian mafia to break into a vault as part of an elaborate bank heist.

title: Buster's Mal Heart
description: On the run from authorities, a troubled man recalls the mysterious events – and the strange drifter – that inspired his unusual transformation.

title: Berlin Syndrome
description: What starts as a passionate one-night stand quickly turns sinister when Clare learns she's locked inside Andi's apartment with no way out.

title: Message from the King
description: On a relentless quest to avenge his sister's murder, a man from Cape Town infiltrates a sprawling network of lowlifes and elites in Los Angeles.

title: The Invisible Guardian
description: When an FBI-trained cop returns to her Navarre hometown to catch a killer targeting local teens, she must also face personal demons from her past.

title: The Invisible Guest
description: After waking next to his now-dead lover in a hotel room, a young businessman hires a prominent lawyer to figure out how he ended up a murder suspect.

title: Boy Missing
description: When her son is kidnapped and later found traumatized, a lawyer takes justice into her own hands, causing events that spiral out of control.

title: The Fury of a Patient Man
description: After his lover is killed in a jewelry store robbery, quiet José romances café owner Ana, who's unaware he has other motivations.

title: Stereo
description: Erik's peaceful rural family life is shaken by the arrival of sinister figures who claim to know him and a mysterious "friend" who may not even exist.

title: A Kind of Murder
description: Obsessed with an unsolved murder case, a crime novelist stuck in an unhappy marriage fantasizes about killing his wife, who soon turns up dead.

title: A Scandall
description: A film school graduate is interested in making a movie about his girlfriend's uncle, who claims that he can see his long-dead daughter.

title: All Good Ones Get Away
description: When a mysterious figure blackmails an adulterous couple during a romantic getaway, their secret affair turns into a fight for survival.

title: Along Came a Spider
description: When a girl is kidnapped from a prestigious prep school, a homicide detective takes the case, teaming up with young security agent.

title: American Hangman
description: A judge’s kidnapping is streamed live on social media, as a vengeful loner puts him on trial for supposedly sending an innocent man to his death.

title: Bad Match
description: A player who uses the internet to facilitate his womanizing ways is tormented when he spurns a persistent woman who won't take no for an answer.

title: Basic Instinct
description: A detective investigating a rock star's brutal murder becomes drawn to the prime suspect — a mysterious novelist whose recent book mirrors the crime.

title: Beneath the Leaves
description: An escaped psychopathic child killer faces off against one of his former victims, who has since become a hard-nosed detective.

title: Blackway
description: Menaced by a psychopath who's got the local cops scared, waitress Lillian turns to a mysterious old logger to help her turn the tables on her stalker.

title: Blue Ruin
description: Bad news from the past unhinges vagabond Dwight Evans, sending him on a mission of bloody retribution that takes him to his childhood hometown.

title: Brick
description: Teenage loner Brendan Fry navigates his high school's intense social network to discover a killer's identity after his secret crush is murdered.

title: Bullitt County
description: When four college friends reunite for a bachelor party, their hunt for cash said to be hidden in Kentucky's backwoods leads to bloodshed and betrayal.

title: Chloe
description: Suspecting her husband of infidelity, Catherine hires sexy Chloe to test his faithfulness. Soon, the relationships between all three intensify.

title: Deadline: Sirf 24 Ghante
description: A surgeon’s perfect life is rattled when his daughter is taken hostage in their own home and he's given 24 hours to pay a hefty ransom.

title: Deewangee
description: Hired by a singer to defend her friend, who has been accused of murder, a formidable lawyer learns that the man he represents may not be innocent.

title: Detour
description: Convinced his stepfather caused the crash that left his mother in a coma, a law student drunkenly agrees to his murder, then can't rescind the deal.

title: Deviant Love
description: In a tailspin after her marriage collapses, Jamie falls for a helpful gentleman whose interest in her welfare hides sinister motives.

title: Dismissed
description: An intelligent but intense honor student traumatizes his high school teacher and mentor when he doesn't get the grade he believes he deserves.

title: Domino
description: A Copenhagen police officer hunts for the man who attacked his partner, only to stumble into a high-stakes game of espionage.

title: Enemy
description: When a humdrum academic spots his double in a movie, he launches a search that leads him to a small-time actor who looks exactly like him.

title: Ethirmarai
description: While investigating a brutal string of deaths, a detective begins to suspect that mind control may have played a part in the murders.

title: Fallen
description: A tough homicide cop faces his most dangerous assignment when he must stop a murderous evil spirit who can move from one host to the next.

title: Fanatic
description: When a successful young rap star has an affair with an obsessive fan, his life is turned upside down when she kidnaps him.

title: Goldstone
description: In the Australian outback, an Indigenous cop on a missing persons case unearths a trafficking ring and runs afoul of political-industrial interests.

title: Hangman
description: A homicide detective, a criminal profiler and a journalist team up to nab a serial killer whose murders are inspired by the classic game of Hangman.

title: Heartthrob
description: A shy, brilliant boy and a popular girl fall into an unexpected romance. But as their bond deepens, his attraction begins taking on dark overtones.

title: Hide and Seek
description: While living a comfortable life with his wife and child, a germophobic man realizes his estranged brother may have committed a terrible crime.

title: Inconceivable
description: A couple trying to conceive invite a woman with a mysterious past to move in with them. But it's an invitation they might come to regret.

title: John Day
description: A bank manager and his wife, still grieving over their daughter who died in a fire, become pawns in a bank heist with ties to corruption and fraud.

title: Kaleidoscope
description: A quiet ex-con's tenuous grip on reality starts to slip when his manipulative mother brings out a part of him he hoped to leave behind.

title: Kiss the Girls
description: A forensic psychologist teams up with an escaped kidnapping victim to hunt down a serial killer who abducts and dominates strong-willed women.

title: Knowing
description: An MIT astrophysics professor and his son unearth a string of numbers from a time capsule that seem to reveal a cataclysm that will wipe out humanity.

title: Lady in the Water
description: When an apartment building manager discovers a water nymph in the complex's swimming pool, he tries to help her return to her mythical home.

title: Lizzie Borden Took an Ax
description: This made-for-TV drama chronicles the scandal and enduring mystery surrounding Lizzie Borden, who was tried in 1892 for axing her parents to death.

title: Ma Chu Ka
description: The relationship between a journalist and a lawyer she meets while investigating a story grows complicated as she uncovers layers of deception.

title: Madre
description: Pregnant and overwhelmed, Diana hires a caretaker for her son with severe autism. But she soon begins to fear the new nanny has sinister intentions.

title: Money
description: Two corporate spies with a $5 million haul for selling secrets are held hostage by a thief, triggering a game of cat and mouse to gain the upper hand.

title: Only God Forgives
description: When a cop kills the brother of an expat American gangster who runs a Bangkok fight club, his crime-boss mother flies in to supervise revenge.

title: Panic Room
description: A woman and her daughter are caught in a game of cat-and-mouse with burglars in their New York City home and are forced to retreat inside a vault.

title: Perfect Stranger
description: Ro risks her life to discover the identity of a stranger lurking on the Internet who might hold the answers to her friend's murder.

title: Running Out Of Time
description: Held hostage by men searching for a secret her late husband left behind, a recent widow and her family race against time to find a way out.

title: Sliver
description: A divorcée moves into a high-rise with a sordid past and begins a steamy affair with her neighbor, unaware that her every move is being monitored.

title: Staged Killer
description: After a popular morning television host bumps into an old acquaintance with a dark past, her professional and personal lives begin to unravel.

title: Suicide (Hitabdut)
description: A failed businessman must kill himself to pay off a loan shark or his family will die, but a detective discovers the case turns on a shocking secret.

title: Tarif de nuit
description: A night out in Paris quickly unravels when two friends provoke the wrong taxi driver, who's after something bigger than cab fare.

title: The Box
description: A couple must decide whether to push a button that will net them a million dollars but that will also cause the death of a complete stranger.

title: The Bygone
description: His way of life under threat due to the oil fracking boom, a young rancher defends a Lakota woman and becomes entangled in human trafficking.

title: The Crying Game
description: IRA terrorist Fergus bonds with his prisoner, Jody. Jody tells Fergus of his girlfriend, Dil, with whom Fergus later falls in love.

title: The Drowning
description: Child psychologist Tom Seymour's testimony helped convict a boy of murder. Years later, their paths cross again, raising uncomfortable questions.

title: The Roommate
description: While acclimating to campus life, college freshman Sara begins to realize that her new roommate, Rebecca, is becoming obsessed with her.

title: The Rover
description: Set in a chaotic future, this Outback saga follows loner Eric's brutal ordeal when a criminal gang takes his car and leaves him nowhere with nothing.

title: The Signal
description: During their drive across the country, college pals Nick and Jonah – accompanied by Nick's girlfriend – run into major trouble in the Nevada desert.

title: The Student
description: When a law professor fails an ambitious student for academic dishonesty, he goes to terrifying lengths to seek revenge for more than just his grade.

title: The Trigger Effect
description: When a power failure throws their suburban town into chaos, Matthew and his wife stoop to desperate measures to secure medication for their child.

title: The Trust
description: Discovering the location of a vault where a drug ring keeps its riches, two run-of-the-mill Las Vegas cops hatch a dicey plan to burgle it.

title: The Wrong Babysitter
description: A widow searches for her missing teenage daughter, not knowing that her seemingly helpful neighbor is hiding a terrible secret.

title: Transcendence
description: Two computer scientists work to achieve technological singularity to create a world where computers can transcend the abilities of the human brain.

title: Trip to Bhangarh: Asia's Most Haunted Place
description: To amuse themselves, six college friends decide to pay a visit to a fortress believed by some to be the most haunted place in Asia.

title: Two Graves
description: A doctor and a drug addict kidnap the son of a local gangster, seeking revenge for the death of a loved one.

title: Unruly Friends
description: A young woman discovers that familial and psychological traumas can be difficult to leave behind.

title: We Belong Together
description: A divorced professor shares a night of passion with a troubled student who quickly develops an unhealthy – perhaps deadly – infatuation.

title: White Chamber
description: When a civil war ravages the UK, a scientist awakens in a futuristic cell and is tortured by her captor for information she claims she doesn't possess.
